name: Underground Grotto
longDesc: Inside the chamber, Derek looks around and  sees a beautiful purple crystal laying on the ground. It sparkles and has a strange glow around it. Shining his flashlight, letters appear inside the crystal. To his left, he finds a large body of water. The water is very clear and not too deep. Concentric rings of ripples from water dripping from stalactites decorate the water.  There is a small canoe tied to a stalagmite.
shortDesc: There is a purple crystal laying on the ground. To the left, there is a large body of water. A small canoe is tied up.
